Html:
Hi,

I just learned about Irony and would like to know if it handles this scenario:

Given 2 strings: System.Int32 and public static int Parse(string s);
I would like to get the MethodInfo of int.Parse(string); or at least the data I need to get that MethodInfo using reflection.

Thanks!

LE: Yes it does :) :) :) It needs more than 2 strings but that's ok, it fits my purpose. Thank you for this wonderful tool!
